text: Sarkozy's little girl's age and name are unknown, however, she didn't seem so little standing next to Olsen as she towered over the fashion designer while they strolled through the trendy Tribeca neighborhood.
title: Mary-Kate Olsen bonds with boyfriend Olivier Sarkozy's young daughter during shopping trip

meta_data.description: Mary-Kate Olsen could have used a high pair of heels. The 27-year-old famous twin was spotted out and about in New York City bonding with her 44-year-old businessman beau Olivier Sarkozy's daughter Thursday.
